Title.StoryInfo:
[UE:Meta key="e88cd01660c84dc69f3a3f4acb5583fd" Scale="1"/]Rescue shipwrecked castaways on an uncharted planet
with the help of Pikmin in this epic adventure.
Title.NoticeInfo: [UE:Meta key="9eb358948b944aae9b201500563f6101" Scale="1"/]A source of helpful information about Pikmin 4.
Title.LocalMatchInfo:
[UE:Meta key="a5f6060f5b3340048730b00b662301f1" Scale="1"/]Put your planning skills to work and manage the clock in this fierce
competition that can be enjoyed solo or with two players.
Title.GalleryInfo:
[UE:Meta key="1f84017e1a024f9b9b254c805eac9c15" Scale="1"/]Experience the excitement all over again!
Rewatch the cutscenes you've seen so far.
